name: Scott the Woz: The Game 2
description:
Hey all, Scott here! This is the sequel to a bad Scott the Woz fangame I made and this is way better. It's based off of Borderline Forever.

WARNING: THIS GAME HAS VIDEO! IT MAY LOAD SLOW!

Credits and controls in game!

There are auditory glitches in the web build and the credit do not work. The bug will be fixed.
